mazerob.pc

Class PC

  • java.lang.Object
    • mazerob.pc.PC

  • public class PC
extends Object
    Main PC application for the mazerob system.

    Uses an instance of Robot for solving a maze with the program stored at MazeSolver.solveMaze(mazerob.pc.Robot).

    Author:
    Pedro I. LÃ³pez

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Main application entry point.

        Command line positional arguments to configure an instance of Robot providing arguments for its constructor Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double):

        1. nxtName argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        2. nxtAddr argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        3. wheelDiameter argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        4. trackWidth argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        5. reverse argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        6. rotationSpeed argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        7. translationMagnitude argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)
        8. rotationMagnitude argument to Robot.Robot(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, NXTCommLogListener, double, double, boolean, double, double, double)

        This method gets a Robot instance configured with the command line positional arguments, executes MazeSolver.solveMaze(mazerob.pc.Robot) and exits.
